attributes.action: Call for a free vote for an Enquiry into the Grooming Gangs cases.
attributes.background: To open a full enquiry into the grooming gangs and the details of results given by Local Authorities, Social Services, Police, CPS and local MP'S as to what could and should have been done. And what was done.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: A full national inquiry into the UK grooming gangs https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715892
